---
type: "EXAMPLE"
title: "The fly.toml Configuration File"
---

**fly.toml = Your Fly.io deployment configuration**

Generated by `fly launch`, customize for your needs:

```toml
# fly.toml - Fly.io Configuration
# Generated by 'fly launch' and customized for FastAPI

app = "finance-tracker"
primary_region = "ord"  # Chicago - change based on your users

# Build configuration
[build]
  dockerfile = "Dockerfile"

# HTTP service configuration
[http_service]
  internal_port = 8000
  force_https = true
  auto_stop_machines = true
  auto_start_machines = true
  min_machines_running = 0
  
  [http_service.concurrency]
    type = "connections"
    hard_limit = 100
    soft_limit = 80

# Health check configuration
[[http_service.checks]]
  interval = "30s"
  timeout = "5s"
  grace_period = "10s"
  method = "GET"
  path = "/health"

# Process configuration
[processes]
  app = "uvicorn src.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"

# VM configuration
[[vm]]
  size = "shared-cpu-1x"
  memory = "256mb"

# Environment variables (non-secrets)
[env]
  ENVIRONMENT = "production"
  DEBUG = "false"
```
